records.story: I noticed 3 planes that flew close to it after 3rd planeI seen object drop down & seem to follow last plane but then stopped & in a straight line came back to original spot.  The first plane appeared too close, & the I next went higher I to the sky & Sat there. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides little contact information.  PD))

records.summary: My neighbor and I were sitting in his front yard located near the Westgate area of Columbus, Ohio when I noticed a golden orange light.
records.story: My neighbor and I were sitting in his front yard located near the Westgate area of Columbus, Ohio, when I noticed a golden orange light traveling west just to the south of our location.  I thought it was a jet making its approach to Columbus International Airport as I normally see them do. As it reached a position nearly due south of us, it turned north (as jets typically do to make their final approach to the airport).  When it cleared the trees, it was obvious this was no jet.  It was a steadily glowing orange object, no sound, no blinking lights and no sign of navigational lights.  This is when I called my friend's attention to it. We watched it reach an angle of about 60 degrees in altitude from where we were standing, it stopped and hovered, emitting a bright and steady orange glow.  There was no "beam" as typically seen from a helicopter search light, just the steady, unchanging glow. After hovering for about 10 seconds, it began to slowly move back southeastward and the glow gradually dimmed until it was just a faint speck.  After it disappeared, we sat back down and tried to find a logical explanation for what we just saw. It was about 2 minutes later, it reappeared again coming north almost straight toward us.  Once it cleared the trees, it  stopped and hovered near the same location for about 10 seconds before nearly retracing its path in a south-southwest direction and dimming till we lost sight of it. This occurrence being between 10 and 11PM, the neighborhood was very quiet so it was easy to discern that there was no sound created by the object.  There were no other lights on it, it did not leave a trail.

records.summary: A rectangular flying object was seen in downtown Columbus, Ohio. The object had an immense glare/light coming from it in broad daylight
records.story: A rectangular flying object was seen in downtown Columbus, Ohio. The object had an immense glare/light coming from it in broad daylight Walking into work in downtown Columbus, and I noticed a glare from the sky.  I looked up and there was a rectangular like shape flying in the sky.  I thought it was a plane at first glance, but then I realized it was way too far for it to have such a strong glare.  It felt like the object had lights projecting off the sides because it was so bright.  My eyes started watering from how bright it was and I couldn't look away, but I could see that there was no bulging shapes like one would see on a plane.  It was remarkable and then it flew over a building and I could no longer see it.  Easily the most bizarre moment of my life.  Keep in mind, it was almost three in the afternoon with zero clouds in the sky, so this object was almost like an immense mirror flying at a distance.  Zero chance a regular airplane has a glare that makes my eyes water from that distance.

records.summary: Very bright and flashing light right near the airport 3 times now.  ((NUFORC Note:  Possible sighting of Mars?  PD))
records.story: Very bright and flashing light right near the airport 3 times now I witnessed a light on Saturday night near the Columbus airport in a neighborhood close by. I watched it for at least 2 hours and it seemed to move occasionally.  It was much bigger than a star and would pulsate and flash or blink.  Sometimes it would go much dimmer.i took many videos and zoomed way in with a camera app on my phone to took several photoa.  They are not the best quality but the object seems to have a circle in the middle of an x in the visible ones.  My phone kept shutting off as if I had no battery even though it was well charged.   Eventually I left and was wondering what it could have been.  My friend whos house it was didn't think it was a ufo of any kind and blew the idea off.   July 3rd late at night we saw the same light in the same exact spot and I felt embarrassed thinking I must have been wrong about the ufo idea.  It must be a satellite or something else.  I'm not sure but two times in the same spot made me doubt myself.  Then there was last ni! ght July the 4th. I saw the same light again.  It seemed brighter and this time there was also a 2nd one a ways across the sky.   I was no certain something is going on and when I went inside to get my phone to take a picture I came back out and it was completely gone.  The first light remained there and didn't seem to do anything strange.  Aside from the occasional flashes and blinks it never flew or moved.  It seemed to just stay in the same place. ((NUFORC Note:  Possible sighting of Mars, we wonder?  PD))

records.summary: Last night, I had sleep paralysis unlike any other time before. Except this time, I opened my eyes (so I believed I opened them) except
records.story: Last night, I had sleep paralysis, unlike any other time before.  Except this time, I opened my eyes (so I believed I opened them) except I could only see out of the center of my forehead.  I would blink and felt like I only had my one eye.  I saw and heard what looked like 3 or 4 grey beings with the big black oval eyes.  Except they looked like they were caught and starting to hurry up and stop because they realized I woke up.   Anyway, my vision out of my one eye was a little blurry because it looked as if I was looking through a clear kaleidoscope.  I felt like I was telling them to go away and leave me alone and so they did.  This time, I didn't wake up from that, I just kept sleeping.  So, what I acknowledged was going on (I think telepathically) was my vision from that one eye was crystallized.  And also telepathically, I told them to stop and they looked like "why were doing something good for you."  And they hurried up and left me with my blurry eye.  Like, I could see their heads moving and looking at one another conversing among each other to hurry, but they didn't hesitate much until I realized "wait a minute, I'm stronger than you " that's when they fled entirely and I slept peacefully without waking up from the experience.

records.summary: Black rectangle craft, green lights
records.story: Black rectangle craft, green lights I was up late watching shows on my computer in bed.  I leaned back into my pillow and looked out the window for a brief moment.  There in the sky was some dark rectangular craft in the sky with green lights.  It was fuzzy in some areas because of the clouds breaking against it.  And sharper in other areas.  I blinked a few times then it disappeared.

records.summary: A Person Moving thru the sky
records.story: A Person Moving thru the sky October 2019  I was driving to work at 7am in the morning, driving down Rt 161, all of a sudden a person in a space suit was moving in the sky towards my direction.  He had on a round space hat and a white space suit he was straight up and down, with no sound and just moving thru the air.  I turned left off the freeway and pulled over,  got out of my car and turned towards that way and he was gone.  Weird

records.summary: A very bright, white, spherical light abruptly appeared in the night sky, and minimized until it became a pinprick and disappeared.
records.story: A very bright, white, spherical light abruptly appeared in the night sky, and minimized until it became a pinprick and disappeared. Outside, I thought a house security light went off in my peripheral, and as I turned to look, I found that the light came from overhead.  In the sky, there was an incredibly bright, white, spherical light, and as I got a good look at it, I reasoned out that it was not a helicopter (Believe me, I wanted to think it was simply a helicopter with its lights on.) Just as I spoke up to get my father to look, the light minimized until it was a pinprick in the sky, and moved away so quickly that I could not follow it.

records.summary: I was taking out the trash when I saw lights coming from the south. First two yellow orange balls came into view and I ran in to get my
records.story: I was taking out the trash when I saw lights coming from the south.  First two yellow orange balls came into view and I ran in to get my wife.  Two more came into view and one changed into a triangle shape and then sped up and disappeared.  Two more went to the north east and the last one spilt off and went north west and then vanished.  I have video and still pictures.  When they passed close to the house the lights in the house dimmed.  No sound whatsoever was heard.

records.summary: "Star" moves from formation of stars west to east at steady pace.
records.story: "Star" moves from formation of stars west to east at steady pace. Sky was dark and several star clusters were clearly apparent with no clouds.  I was looking westwards at a set of 5 stars when suddenly one started moving eastwards at a consistent speed.  It looked like it was at a similar distance as all of the other stars in the early morning sky.  No flashing lights at all, just a solid light that looked identical to a star.  It moved slowly west to east, straight over my head.   Note:  There were two other planes in the sky towards the right of my vision that were very clearly airplanes, as they had the flashing red lights.

records.summary: Black Triangle UFO/TR-3B sighting North of John Glenn Int'l Airport Ohio
records.story: Black Triangle UFO/TR-3B sighting North of John Glenn Int'l Airport Ohio While carpooling to work on the morning of Nov 1, 2019 on I-270 South, I noticed some bright and seemingly close lights to my right side (from passenger seat). I glanced at the lights and assumed it was an airliner as it was directly north of Columbus Int'l Airport, but took a second look because it seemed strange. I immediately noticed that the lights/object had not moved, only hovering in place and there were very bright white lights at 3 corners of the object with dimmer yellow/orange lights in the "center." The lights were flashing in a random order across the object. The object never changed position and was hovering quite low in the sky (I was able to directly observe it from the car without straining or moving). I was able to make out clearly the shape of the object against the clouds, which was a very large, black/dark grey triangle. It appeared to be roughly the size of an airliner, or possibly larger.

records.summary: I saw 2 giant glowing green balls connected by one long white light flying extremely low.  ((anonymous report))
records.story: I was driving into town on a usual route, when I see 2 giant glowing green balls connected by one long white light flying extremely low over the nearby gas station.  It flew down toward the ground really fast.  As it went below the powerlines, it disappeared just as everyone else in the car seen the thing vanish.  We live in a military town and have seen strange lights before but nothing like this.

records.summary: Pyschic Research of the new Space Force and our 10 UFO craft
records.story: Pyschic Research of the new Space Force and our 10 UFO craft 	I have been a psychic for at least 25 years and with the recent resurgence of UFO stories and recent sightings in the last few years, decided to try and find out more about UFOs than we the public have been told. 	I started with trying to find out if we have UFOs working with our military, since President Trump declared the forming of our new Space Force.  My findings are that we do have craft, 10 at the present and that we have already been traveling with them for decades.  I also am seeing that the Moon does have a secret base on the far side, occupied by us, Israel and of course ETs.  Money spent by us alone, comes at around $750 billion over the course of it's existence and construction has been partnered 3 ways. 	The other facts that I've seen are that the craft have the ability to go from Earth to Moon in 15 minutes and Earth to Mars in 2 1/2 hrs. to a base that's there, too. 	The old Majestic 12 group are now a group of 32, headed by an Air Force General, Marc Jamison, also commanding the secret M.I.B. unit.  His name came to me letter by letter and afterwards all I had to do was to Google his name and below is what I was totally amazed to find.  Excerpt from the internet: Col Marc Jamison, (ret.), USAF, Former Director of Future Operations, J35 and Chief Modeling and Simulation (USCYBERCOM), CSFI Advisory Director    Colonel (Ret) Marc Jamison consults on Cyber Security, Strategy and Operations for his own company Cyber CheckMate Consultants. He has consulted for over 30 industry partners supporting cyber operations. Recently, he completed a tour at STG as their VP of DOD and IC Business Development. From 2013-2016 he supported the US Army as they build their new Cyber Electromagnetic Activities (CEMA) concept combing Cyber and Electronic Warfare. He worked for L-3 Communications as the Director of Cyber Operations and Director of Strategic Ventures that included Merger & Acquisition evaluations and oversight of strategic partnerships with universities Colonel Jamison has more than 30 years of progressive experience directing, managing, and training government teams in air operations and cyber security. He has led and planned national Cyber, Counter Terror and Air Operations and has advised senior-level USG leadership on strategies and policy. Colonel Jamison is a demonstrated expert in cyber strategy, planning, training, threats, operations, policy and organizations. Prior to industry, Colonel Jamison served as J35 Director of Future Operations for USCYBERCOM and as the J3 Director of Operation for its predecessor organization Joint Functional Component Commander – Network Warfare (J3) at Ft. Meade. He spent three years as a senior executive establishing USCYBERCOM, a “plank holder”, where he directed multiple national level operations and developed cyber doctrine and tactics, techniques and procedures. Colonel Jamison is a retired U.S. Air Force Colonel and combat aviator, who flew B-52 and B-1 bombers. He was the Director of USAFE’s Strategy Division and commanded the Combat Plans Squadron for 8th Air Force. He is a graduate of the School for Advanced Air and Space Studies and USAF Weapons School. He holds four Master’s degrees, including an M.S. in Strategic Studies from the U.S. Army War College and is a published author. Colonel Jamison serves on the Board of Directors for Association of Old Crows, Cyber Security Forum Initiative (CSFI) and on San Antonio’s Chamber of Commerce Cyber Industry Council .  	Last information that I sought was where these ETs have been coming from.  Without putting a whole lot of time into it, I'm seeing that we are the only advanced specie in the Milky Way, the Greys are the only ones in the entire Andromeda Galaxy and the next 2 closest Galaxies after that have no advanced species.  The Greys have the ability to travel here in 8 hrs. by bending Space/Time.

records.summary: 57 separate bright white lights flying from West Southwest to the Northeast.  ((NUFORC Note:  "Starlink" satellites?  PD))
records.story: 57 separate bright white lights flying from West Southwest to the Northeast I went to let my dogs out at approx 6:10am this morning it was still pretty dark out yet so visibility was pretty good In the night sky with very little if not any cloud cover. I often look up at the sky this time of year because of the waterfowl usually flying over. I happened to notice a bright white light traveling from west southwest towards the Northeast. I thought nothing of it at first because we typically see allot of satellites traveling over head in the night and early morning. I watched it for  a minute then happened to see another one trailing behind the first one and it appeared to be a few to several miles behind the initial light. I thought that to be strange but not completely out of the ordinary. Then I saw another and another and another. Then sometimes 2 close together but not connected. Then another and another. It was a constant stream of separate lights all flying in the same direction at presumably the same altitude. It was quiet and very little wind so I could hear that they made no noise and no vapor trail was visible. As we see many commercial jets fly over all the time and they are easy to differentiate. I yelled at my son To come outside to see if he could see what I was seeing and he and I stood and watched no less than 57 separate flying objects passed over in a 20 min period flying on that same heading. Sometimes pretty good distances apart and several flying fairly close together. But we felt the pattern was quite random to be sure. I am a military vet and I’ve seen allot of different strategic flying formations, from both Navy and Air Force and I felt this was just to weird to ignore. We counted 57 but am not sure how long it had been going on before I spotted em. We tried recording the images but they were to small to pick up on our phone cameras.
